org.eclipse.january.io

Interface IMetaLoader


  • public interface IMetaLoader
    Interface used to mark a loader as being available to load and return metadata without loading the entire file into memory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMetadata getMetadata()
      Returns an object containing some data about the data file to be read in.
      void loadMetadata(IMonitor mon)
      Loads the meta data from the file but not all the data.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMetadata

        void loadMetadata(IMonitor mon)
                  throws IOException
        Loads the meta data from the file but not all the data. This can be read in more cheaply than the entire data.
        Parameters:
        mon -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getMetadata

        IMetadata getMetadata()
        Returns an object containing some data about the data file to be read in.
        Returns:
        IMetadata
